Class WellSystem.ReservoirLayer

java.lang.Object
neqsim.process.equipment.reservoir.WellSystem.ReservoirLayer
Enclosing class:
WellSystem
public static class WellSystem.ReservoirLayer extends Object
Represents a single reservoir layer for commingled wells.

      name - layer name
